verses.verse: For the director.[b] A psalm of the sons of Korah.
All you peoples, clap your hands,[c] shout to God with cries of gladness.
For the LORD, the Most High, is awesome; he is the great King over all the earth.
He subdued nations under us and brought peoples under our feet.
He chose our inheritance for us, the pride of Jacob,[d] whom he loved. Selah
[e]God has ascended amid shouts of joy; the LORD, amid the sound of trumpets.
Sing praises to God, sing praises; sing praises to our King, sing praises.
For God is the King of the entire earth; sing hymns of praise to him.
God reigns over all the nations; God is seated on his holy throne.
